snippet.title: Teaser Trailer: Mother Bunker
snippet.description:
The zombie apocalypse is here, and you want to survive (obviously). Or at least take out as many undead as possible before you succumb. So grab your weapon, look for supplies, build your bunker, and always aim for the head.
Out now on Meta! https://www.meta.com/experiences/7328977427216703/
Wishlist Mother Bunker on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3031070/Mother_Bunker_VR/
